website_summaries.verdict: Designed with safety in mind, this stroller offers everything you could ever need to protect your child at the best price.
pros: Maneuvers well, even with one hand
cons: Only has a single canopy, unlike the dual lined canopies of more expensive models

customer_reviews.title: Solid and compact. Perfect for a slightly older sibling and new baby
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the heavy side, but it feels solid and folds very compact especially compared to the room2grow stroller. Those that are complaining about the bench being unusable when a car seat in on the front part probably missed the instruction to remove the tray part of the arm bar at the front. The newer click connect car seats need that part to be removed so that it latches on to the bare arm bar several inches further forward.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pinkney

customer_reviews.title: It was the best purchase I could have made
customer_reviews.text: Used this at Disney for my 1year old and 5 year old. It was the best purchase I could have made. It was perfect for all the walking at Disney. Both of my kids rode in it the whole time. I like this one especially because the front seat folds down almost flat for when my 1 year old needed a nap. Plan on using it for outings at home too.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMom2

customer_reviews.title: Works out great for our n
customer_reviews.text: Works out great for our n.b and toddler. Toddler did complain after a bit about the back of seat was pushed forward too far with carseat attached to front. Easy break down and glide. We really enjoyed having both kids in 1 stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, dependable, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller! Easy to use and very stable base. Wonderful for taking baby and older sibs who get tired of walking. Fits in car multiple ways, flat, upright behind seat, or on side. Tall canopy fits over car seat canopy for extra protection from elements.
customer_reviews.author: Deb H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and fits with our graco connect car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria V

customer_reviews.title: Your toddler and new born in a infant car seat are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is the best thing I have ever bought. I totally recommend this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my granddaughter. She loves it for her infant and toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Pigott

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Great product by Graco. We have only bought Graco products and never went wrong. This one is another great stroller for two kids.
customer_reviews.author: Malik Imran Syed

customer_reviews.title: I Love it. It's big and bulky
customer_reviews.text: I Love it. It's big and bulky, yeah, but that is to be expected. I mean the time it takes to get everythign ready to go is quick. And my 6month old and 6 year old fit perfect. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stroller. Comfortable for the kids and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Dennise

customer_reviews.title: It says it works with any Graco Click Connect infant ...
customer_reviews.text: It says it works with any Graco Click Connect infant seat but it's way too difficult to put car seat specially with a baby in it. And it's too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. I have the Zooper Tango Double stroller also and it is so hard to push. it is so big and bulky and hard to maneuver.this Graco is so much nicer, I use it for my 2 & 3yr old grandsons. The 3 year old loves sitting on the backside & the 2yr old is happy to still sit up front. It is super lightweight and so easy to push them. it makes evening walks so much more fun. This is a must have if you need a easy lightweight double stroller and the price is really affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Montez

customer_reviews.title: great stroller at a great price! my kids love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller!! I use it with my 40 pound 4 year old and my 9 month old. The car seat clicks on and off super easy and is very stable. Turns like a dream despite its large size. My baby also finds it very easy to nap in the reclining position and my 4 year old loves standing on the back. The cupholders are great. I only give it 4 stars instead of 5 because we are a family constantly taking items in and out of our bag which is hard to get to in bottom basket. Really glad we purchased this stroller as some of the more expensive brands have lower weight limits and larger footprints.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Catanese

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with your color selection
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for an infant and 4 year old. I'm really looking forward to using it...I'm sure we'll be able to use it for several years. The undercarriage is smaller and harder to get to than I expected, but I can manage. Also, I specifically ordered the Gotham selection which was a bit more expensive at the time, but was sent Glacier. I'm concerned about dirt showing on the lighter color, but overall I think this is a great stroller for my two boys.
customer_reviews.author: N. Urban

customer_reviews.title: The concept of this stroller is nice. But the area for toddler is too close ...
customer_reviews.text: The concept of this stroller is nice. But the area for toddler is too close to the infant seat. My daughter has to lean slightly forward because the infant seat pushes against her. The wheels are also plastic which i don't care for. But i may be spoiled after owning the graco click and connect jogger which has tires like a bike trailer. I also dont like that when folded it does not stand upright. But for the price it gets the job done of totting my toddler and infantm
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! We bought this to use with our 4yo and 4 month old. My 4yo loves his little spot to sit or stand!! I really like the basket underneath to hold our things and the cubby/cup holder is great! The only thing (if I'm being nitpicky) is that since I still connect my sons car seat to the front, it takes away some room from the sit/stand area... But the will obviously not be a problem when I just use the front seat!
customer_reviews.author: Undeniable1

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: The best stroller we ever bought!!!! I love this stroller, easy to fold and put away, love the cup holders. My 10 month old fits comfortably up front and my son loves hopping on and off. Perfect for tired toddlers after a long day!
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose but not awesome
customer_reviews.text: We like this stroller, but don't love it. When using the car seat in the front, or reclining the front seat back, it is difficult for another child to sit in back. The awning is high and narrow, and doesn't do a lot to block sun, but is really awkward and in the way, especially when folded. We had the stroller for three months before realizing that the awning came of, and it wasn't for not trying. Also, the adapter for the car seat is black, and is tucked under the beverage tray. Only by searching Amazon reviews did I discover THAT tidbit. At first I thought it came with no adapter. The assembly instructions are minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Baker

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: It came missing an important part - Graco says that part is back ordered and would be at our house Mat 15. Um. Not here yet. We just need the stroller to work. We should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: A. LOVEJOY

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Came with the locking brakes installed wrong. Not enough configurations for the carrier and toddler seating. The toddler can only be in the sit and stand area. There is no option if the toddler wants to take a nap, while using the carrier. You have to hold the carrier if you want to use the traditional front seat. Other models have better options. The cargo area is tiny and only accessible from the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Janan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Graco in my opinion has always put out quality products. This product in particular lacked quality. I
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews I was a little hesitant about this stroller. But don't believe everything you read! This stroller is awesome!! I read about people saying there is no room for your toddler to sit in the back. Tip---you can take off the snack tray in front and you don't even have to move the seat back. Plently of room for my 3 year old or 18 month old. The front seat is definitely meant for a younger child. I would say 3 and under depending how big your child is. Drives great, easy fold up, can put easily into back of vehicle. Do yourself a favor and buy it! Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Denise A.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't open the stroller before I gave it as ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't open the stroller before I gave it as a present. I found out that when it was opened it was broken.How disappointing! When my friend returned and tried to order another one, it was discontinued .
customer_reviews.author: gina hall

customer_reviews.title: Also handy as a shopping basket
customer_reviews.text: The rear seat reminds me of the 3rd row seats in large SUVs - it's useful but not as comfortable for the 2nd child. The padding is relatively thin all around, and is easy to clean. The wheels are not entirely hard, rather they feel like dense foam for a little bit of shock absorption. I like this for shopping trips. The 2nd seat provides an area for the merchandise. It is easier to securely strap down the little monster into this stroller than into the primitive seating area of shopping carts. Here is a closer photo of the shopping basket area.
customer_reviews.author: D. Coral

customer_reviews.title: Wheel fell off in the middle of a busy street!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller had everything I was looking for for my infant and 4 yr. old. It was fine for the first few months, but the rear wheel hubcaps often came loose. Eventually one came off and we didn't even notice until the left rear wheel went spinning off as we were crossing the street in the city. What a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: AL

product_meta.title: Graco Roomfor2 Click Connect Stand and Ride Stroller, Glacier
product_meta.description:
The Graco RoomFor2 is ideal for walking and running errands with two children, with front and rear seats that each hold a child up to 50 pounds. The front seat features a multi-position recline, which can be placed in a fully flat position for naptime. The rear bench seat, perfect for your older child, is padded for comfort. As a fun alternative, he or she can opt to stand on the sturdy platform. Also suitable for infants, this double tandem stroller is compatible with all Graco Classic Connect and Click Connect infant car seats.

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: Holds 2 children up to 50 lbs each
Accepts all Graco SnugRide Classic Connect & Click Connect Infant Car Seats
Child can sit on padded bench seat or stand on platform
Multi-position, reclining front seat lies flat

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars41 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
